data.message: Eminem was better back then and how he sounds way different when you get older your voice don't change like that and people say it's drugs I say bullshit

replies.message:
SSLp was his signature sound, he rapped like that on purpose... He slowly evolved and changed his voice, style and rhyme patterns on every song and album. 

Listen to Infinite and then the SSLP...two different sounds of voice. You must stand out in Hip Hop...have to be different to become a legend
